p:
Contact angle measurements were taken on blank PDMS chips and the different geo-material PDMS chips along with their respective rock types with and without PVA treatment. This is done to assess the wettability of the fabricated chip in comparison to their equivalent rock types. The contact angles are for air/DI-water/rock or PDMS chips. A droplet of deionized water was placed on the surface of a sample and contact angle was measured from the collected image using the contact angle plugin for ImageJ
78 . To validate contact angles for the sandstone and carbonate geo-material chips (with and without PVA), the Cassie’s equation
63, 64 was used and effective contact angles were measured as
7
